short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save screen space with a simple button to access all your favorites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your bookmarks bar with this extension. Simply add your favorites, and they will appear in the top right corner with a click of a button.
